directed_edges: Diabetic patients are at a higher risk of getting pneumococcal disease
Diabetic patients are at a higher risk of getting pneumococcal disease and are therefore recommended to get vaccinated.
Further research is needed due to the potentially major clinical implications for diabetic patients

The aim of our systematic review is the retrieval and analysis of all available evidence on the effect of pneumococcal vaccination on the risk of hospitalization and death in adult patients with diabetes. [...] Further research is needed due to the potentially major clinical implications for diabetic patients. The results of this systematic review can serve as a foundation for future studies, indicating the importance of continuing research in this area to improve patient outcomes.
